displayTopicName: The _pi'el_ participle of the shoresh קדש

The pi'el participle of the shoresh קדש.text: , feminine singular, masculine plural, and feminine plural.

Masculine singular.text: The Hebrew masculine singular participle of the shoresh "קדש" is מְקַדֵּשׁ, pronounced "mekadesh."
